snippet: London's financial services center would lose access to the wider European Union should Britain quit the bloc, the EU's justice chief said on Monday, warning that such a move would reduce its status to that of an offshore center...

headline.print_headline: EU's Reding Warns Brexit Would Isolate London's City
headline.main: EU's Reding Warns Brexit Would Isolate London's City

lead_paragraph: London's financial services center would lose access to the wider European Union should Britain quit the bloc, the EU's justice chief said on Monday, warning that such a move would reduce its status to that of an offshore center
